item.title: [B][COLOR gold] [COLOR lime]Test Pretemporada F1 2018 (Gracias a VelocidadATope.com)[/COLOR][/B]
[B][COLOR orange][01] - [/COLOR][/B][B][COLOR deepskyblue] Test pretemporada [/COLOR][COLOR yellow] - DÃ­a 1[/COLOR][/B]

regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import re , requests ,json def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):
ref = 'http://kbagi.com/' url='http://kbagi.com/Josele89/motor-618870/f1-2018-hora-f1-260218-27d,5634688,list,1,1.mp4' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ref , 'X-Requested-With' : 'XMLHttpRequest' , 'Accept' : '*/*'} session = requests.Session() r = session.get(url, headers=headers) rv1 = r.cookies
vfile , vtoken = re.findall('action/DownloadFile.*?fileId.*?value="(.*?)".*?Token".*?value="(.*?)"', r.text)[0] data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=%s'%vfile , headers=headers,cookies=rv1 , data=data_a).text nrj=json.loads(nr) nr = nrj['Content'] r2 = re.findall(r'(?s)value=\"(.*?)\"', nr)[0] data_a ={'__RequestVerificationToken': r2 , 'Username': 'Josele89' , 'Password' : 'barcelona'} nr1 = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/Account/Login', headers=headers,cookies = rv1 , data=data_a) print nr1.headers['Set-Cookie'] rasp = re.findall('ASPXAUTH_v2=(.*?);', nr1.headers['Set-Cookie'])[0] rv1['.ASPXAUTH_v2'] = rasp data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr3 = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=%s'%vfile , headers=headers, cookies = rv1 , data=data_a).text r3 = re.findall('DownloadUrl":"(.*?)"', nr3)[0] print r3 return r3

regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re , requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): url='http://diskokosmiko.mx/josele89/f1-motos-carreras-90233/f1-2018-hora-f1-260218-27d,1978502,list,1,1.mp4' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ''} r = requests.get(url, headers=headers).text vfile , vtoken = re.findall('action/DownloadFile.*?fileId.*?value="(.*?)".*?Token".*?value="(.*?)"', r)[0] #print data_a ref = url headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ref,'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest'} data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr = requests.post('http://diskokosmiko.mx/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=1698892', headers=headers, data=data_a).text movie = re.findall('DownloadUrl":"(.*?)"', nr)[0] print movie return movie
